mjaksic.Hive_Redis_To_Spark_To_Hive.spark

Class SparkKafkaAmalgamation

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjaksic.Hive_Redis_To_Spark_To_Hive.spark.SparkKafkaAmalgamation

  • public class SparkKafkaAmalgamation
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects to Kafka, consumes data and sends it thought to Spark streaming. An experimental class.
